	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">下载地址：<a href="http://code.google.com/p/freecms/" rel="nofollow" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px; ">http://code.google.com/p/freecms/</a></span></p>
<h3 style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; "> </span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">模板管理</span></h3>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">模板是指设计师已经做好的页面文件，经过处理成为模板，它可以改变网页所有的内容布局、颜色、风格等。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">从左侧管理菜单点击模板管理进入。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">

	 </p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<strong style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">从FreeCMS 1.2 开始支持</strong></p>

<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<b style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; "><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">提示</span></b><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">：</span></p>

	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; "><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">1）<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; "> </span></span></span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">可使用的站点可以限制使用此模板的站点，如果不选择是表示所有站点都可以使用。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; "><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">2）<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; "> </span></span></span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">添加成功后会在<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">/templet</span>目录下生成以一个以此模板<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">id</span>为名字的文件夹。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201728_YLbL_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px; " target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201728_YLbL_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer; " /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	 </p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">此文件夹下会自动生成三个文件</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201805_rdiK_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px; " target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1225/201805_rdiK_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer; " /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	 </p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">首页指使用此模板的站点首页，在首页静态化时系统会根据站点模板下的"首页</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">.html</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">"文件来生成站点首页。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">栏目页面指使用此模板的站点栏目页面，在栏目页静态化时系统会默认根据站点模板下的"栏目页面</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">.html</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">"文件来生成栏目页面，如果您指定此目录下其它文件作为栏目页面的模板文件，则系统使用您指定的页面进行静态化。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">信息页面指使用此模板的站点信息页面，在信息页静态化时系统会默认根据站点模板下的"信息页面</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">.html</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">"文件来生成信息页面，如果您指定此目录下其它文件作为信息页面的模板文件，则系统使用您指定的页面进行静态化。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">
	<b style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; "><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; "><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">3.<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; ">  </span></span></span></b><b style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; "><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">编辑模板</span></b></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px; ">

	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">选择需要编辑的模板，如"测试模板"，点击"编辑"按钮</span></p>

<p>

	<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">FreeCMS</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-family: 宋体; ">提供了在线管理模板文件的功能。</span></p>
<p>
